Class Description
Annotation Annotation to store file and a description associate to it.
AnnotationStore TopObject for Annotation package
MolFeature The feature is an annotation on a residue. The feature is a modification, a mutation,... made in comparison to the wild type sequence, or a simple comment for a particular residue.
